p: Unfortunately, we did not have patient epidemiological data available for these samples to confirm whether subjects infected by URFs came from areas with co-circulation of HIV-1 strains or were infected in the UK. However, the HIV-infected population attended in the clinics included in the study mainly corresponded to men-having-sex-with-men (MSM), who traditionally have been mostly infected in the UK (e.g. 68% of MSM in 2015 [ 40]).
